automata.title: Automata
automata.description: Kits that illustrate core concepts of cams, cranks and gears which are the most used and base of all mechanical systems.
automata.detailedDescription: In the scope of the new technological era we live in, creative learning, prototyping and innovative problem solving are increasing in value day by day. However, newcomers in K12 laboratories find it quite challenging to take on new projects by themselves. Our observations in STEM projects and robotics competitions revealed a significant gap between theoretical knowledge and practical applications in mechanical systems. Aiming to find a constructive way to fill this gap, we prototyped kits labeled "automata". Creativity can enhance the hands-on multidisciplinary learning experience by drawing interest in the process of creating a unique outcome.

lemon.title: Lemon
lemon.description: Lemon is an affordable and accessible tool for introducing K-12 students to quick prototyping.
lemon.detailedDescription: Lemon is a robotics education kit that allows beginners to improve their knowledge of mechanics, electronics, 3D design, and programming while building 3 subsequent biomimetic robots. It helps develop students' understanding of robotics and computer sciences while guiding their discovery of the procedure of making a robot.

tutorial_videos.name: How to program a Lemon robot

ironinnovatorsrocket.title: Iron Innovators - Rocket
ironinnovatorsrocket.description: The Iron Innovator’s rocket STEM kit helps 1st–2nd graders explore gravity, inertia, and Newton’s Third Law through a hands-on syringe rocket.
ironinnovatorsrocket.detailedDescription: The Iron Innovator's rocket STEM kit is designed for 1st - 2nd graders to learn basic concepts about gravity and inertia. Our simple syringe rocket kit show kids basic physics in action. When air is pushed out of the syringe, the rocket shoots in the opposite direction, demonstrating Newton’s Third Law. As the compressed air’s potential energy becomes the rocket’s kinetic energy, kids can explore physics concepts with hands on solutions!

media.name: Iron Innovators_ How to Assemble the Rocket Kit - Zach Hines.mp4
media.file: assets/ironinnovatorsrocket/Iron Innovators_ How to Assemble the Rocket Kit - Zach Hines.mp4

lightsaber.title: Lightsaber
lightsaber.description: The Lightsaber kit is a STEM kit that allows kids to learn about basic circuitry.

squigglebot.title: Squiggle Bot
squigglebot.description: The Squiggle Bot is a kit that allows beginners to create their own mini-bot that draws, improving their knowledge of basic electric circuits.

toothbrushbot.title: Toothbrush Bot
toothbrushbot.description: The Toothbrush Bot is a robotics education kit that allows beginners to improve their knowledge on electric circuits while building a mini robot.
